title: 4D Cartesian N-Body Simulation
text:
An interactive simulation of gravitational bodies in 4D space using Cartesian coordinates.

This visualization shows how objects interact in 4-dimensional space, represented as projections into our 3D viewpoint. The fourth dimension creates unique orbital patterns not possible in standard 3D space.

Open 4D Cartesian Simulation

Related: [[4d4me]] | [[InfiniteSpace]] | [[Rasorb]]
